name: Shogun Dynasty
description: A disciplined army of samurai, ninja, and feudal lords serving under the great Shogun.

shogun.name: Shogun
shogun.special: Strongest unit, defeated only by Ninja when attacked
shogun.description: Supreme military ruler of the dynasty

daimyo.name: Daimyo
daimyo.description: Feudal lord commanding vast lands and loyal retainers

ronin_captain.name: Ronin Captain
ronin_captain.description: Masterless samurai fighting for honor and fortune

archer_captain.name: Archer Captain
archer_captain.description: Commands bowmen who rain arrows upon enemies from afar

ashigaru.name: Ashigaru
ashigaru.description: Common foot soldiers forming the core of the army

spear_guard.name: Spear Guard
spear_guard.description: Disciplined infantry trained in spear formations

sapper.name: Sapper
sapper.special: Only unit that can safely dismantle Explosive Barrels
sapper.description: Engineers skilled in setting and defusing explosive traps

scout_rider.name: Scout Rider
scout_rider.special: Can move multiple spaces in a straight line
scout_rider.description: Mounted scouts swiftly surveying the battlefield

ninja.name: Ninja
ninja.special: Defeats Shogun when attacking, weakest otherwise
ninja.description: Stealth assassin striking unseen from the shadows

dynasty_banner.name: Dynasty Banner
dynasty_banner.description: Sacred banner representing the Shogun's rule

explosive_barrel.name: Explosive Barrel
explosive_barrel.special: Destroys any attacking unit except Sappers
explosive_barrel.description: Hidden barrels of gunpowder waiting to explode
